divs: Sighting DetailsI was riding my harley and I saw what I thougt was a Plane crash in a farm field. I parked it and walked over. I saw it come out it looked like bigfoot . I peed my pants. It then ran into palmetto bushes. aND i LOST SIGHT OF IT. I DIDNT SEE THE SHIP IT WAS IN
